name: Chibi Heros - Thief
description:
Thief joins the party. All sprite sheets as before, run, attack, ilde, death and rotate. zip file embeded.

This is the third of a 6 heros party. 

check the other:

https://didigameboy.itch.io/-chibi-warrior-pack

I'll use them probably in a idle game but I've animated them as they can be able to go in a 2D action platform or a jrpg style game.

Also starting a patreon for this and more.
